mapper.insert:
insert into t_customer_order_ota(company_id, order_no, hotel_name, house_name, order_time, customer_name, website_name, website_id, unit_price, total_days, total_pay, ota_commission, actual_money, checkin_time, checkout_time, remark) values
(#{item.companyId}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.hotelName}, #{item.houseName}, #{item.orderTime}, #{item.customerName}, #{item.websiteName}, #{item.websiteId}, #{item.unitPrice},#{item.totalDays}, #{item.totalPay}, #{item.otaCommission}, #{item.actualMoney}, #{item.checkinTime}, #{item.checkoutTime}, #{item.remark})
